tutStep1Text: With this tool, you can import your shift plans into your calendar more easily.
tutStep2Text:
First, you need to define your shifts in the settings.

You can then assign these to individual days on the shift schedule page according to your shift plan.
tutStep3Text:
In the settings, you can also edit or delete existing shifts.

Note that changes to shifts are automatically applied to an existing shift schedule.
tutStep4Text:
On the shift schedule page, you can then assign your shifts to the corresponding days.

If you select a different shift, the previous one will be overwritten. If you select the same shift again, it will be removed.
tutStep5Text:
If you have not selected a shift, you can edit an existing shift on a specific day by tapping.

With the "Clear" button, you can reset the entire shift schedule.
tutStep6Text: Once you have created your shift schedule, you can export it to your calendar via the export button.
